title: 이달의소녀탐구 #72 (LOONA TV #72)
summary:
0:02 -- 2Jin start acting cute: “Two~ o’ clock!”. YeoJin joins them.
0:10 -- HaSeul mentions that she can’t do this but still does it (and does it very cutely)
It looks like a war between cuties!!!
0:20 -- They arrive at a restaurant and start clicking selfies.
0:30 -- The food arrives and the PD asks HaSeul how the food is. HaSeul starts speaking
about the food and gets interrupted by HeeJin: “Is it an award speech?” 😎
